basics.name: John Doe
basics.label: Senior Software Engineer
basics.summary: Experienced software engineer with 8+ years of expertise in full-stack development, distributed systems, and cloud architecture. Passionate about building scalable solutions and mentoring engineering teams.

work.name: Tech Corp
work.summary: Lead developer for the core platform team, responsible for designing and implementing scalable microservices architecture.
highlights: Architected and deployed a real-time data processing pipeline handling 1M+ events per second
Led migration from monolith to microservices, reducing deployment time by 80%
Mentored 5 junior developers and established code review best practices

work.name: StartupXYZ
work.summary: Core team member at a fast-growing B2B SaaS startup, building features from concept to production.
highlights: Built customer-facing dashboard used by 10,000+ daily active users
Implemented OAuth2 authentication system with SSO support
Reduced API response times by 60% through query optimization

work.name: WebAgency Inc
highlights: Developed responsive web applications for 20+ clients
Created reusable component library adopted across all projects

projects.name: Open Source CLI Tool
